metadata.title: CVE-2024-45157 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Mbed TLS before 2.28.9 and 3.x before 3.6.1, inwhich the user-selected algorithm is not used. Unlike previouslydocumented, enabling MBEDTLS_PSA_HMAC_DRBG_MD_TYPE does not cause the PSAsubsystem to use HMAC_DRBG: it uses HMAC_DRBG only whenMBEDTLS_PSA_CRYPTO_EXTERNAL_RNG and MBEDTLS_CTR_DRBG_C are disabled.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
